millsfield:images_texts:
Okole Maluna! BULA!
the Clipper bar will be pleased
to serve you*
Bourbon Highball . . 65¢
Scotch Highball ... 65¢
Cigarettes (pkg.) .. 15¢
No Charge for
Soft Drinks and Canapés
1 volre sante
*Ask your Purser for Bar Service
Salud y pesetas! CHEERs! Mabuhay!

very hour of the day and night, swift
Flying Clippers like yours are winging towards distant
horizons, carrying passengers, mail and cargo to six con-
tinents. Today all countries are neighbors, because far-
ranging Clippers, flying on regular, convenient schedules,
have telescoped distance, reduced travel days to hours.
Throughout the Pacific and Alaska, Pan American Clip-
pers are ready to take you wherever you want to go,
swiftly and in comfort. Here, experience rides with you,-
zealously guarding your flight. Behind you stands an
organization that pioneered air transportation in the
Pacific, and has operated more Pacific flights, logged more
Pacific miles, and carried more Pacific passengers than any
other airline.
When you travel by Pan American — anywhere in the
world — you enjoy the same high standards of hospitality
JAIN TEMPLE, INDIA
TEMPLE SPIRES, SIAM
LUNGHWA PAGODA, CHINA

Your Adventure in the
This Packet Is Yours. In it you'll find Flying Clipper-wise
—a booklet that describes the many personal services you
may expect during your trip. The Civil Aeronautics Authority
asks that every over-water passenger read the instructive and
interesting section that tells about emergency procedures.
PAA
Clipper America Service
PAN AMERICAN WORLD AIRWAYS
The System of the Hying Clippers

PAN AMERICAN WORLD AIRWAYS
among all U. S. airlines was -
FIRST to establish international service
FIRST to fly to all six continents
FIRST to schedule round-the-world flights
FIRST to fly with a multiple crew
FIRST to offer steward service
FIRST to serve meals aloft
FIRST to use four-engine transports
FIRST to train its pilots in
"blind" instrument flying
FIRST to provide Sleeperette* Service
FIRST to order and to fly Double-Decked Clippers
*Trade Mark, Pan American Airways, In
LITHO IN U. S. A.
9931.56

DoKI Clipper Pervice
DECKED
Fying Clipper wise

ABOUT TIPPING...
How did the word "Tip" originate? Accord-
ing to legend it was derived from the initial
letters of the phrase "To Insure Promptness."
Boxes were set up in English Inns during the
18th Century and imprinted with the above
phrase. This was to remind the guests that a
coin deposited in these boxes would bring
special service. Later the phrase was ab-
breviated to T. I. P.
Aboard the Pan American Flying Clippers, a
Tip—To Insure Promptness —is not neces-
sary. Your Purser will be happy to give you
prompt, courteous service.
PAN AMERICAN WORLD AIRWAYS
PRINTED

Pan American Announces
4 NEW CLIPPER SERVICES
The Flying Clippers Have Returned to ...
SINGAPORE
Once Again the Clippers Link Singapore with Manila
and Pan American's Round-the- World Route.
Double-decked Clipper Service extended to...
TOKYO and MANILA
World's Largest, Fastest Airliners Offer the Finest in
Air Travel Between THE ORIENT and the U. S. A.
NOW Constellation Clippers Provide Fastest,
Most Frequent Service from ...
HONG KONG
to ENGLAND— EUROPE and THE U.S. A.
DOUBLE-DECKED CLIPPERS NOW SERVE
ALL 4 U. S. GATEWAY CITIES
Now you can step aboard one of these 61 passenger
Clippers at Manila or Tokyo and fly via Honolulu to
either Seattle, Portland, San Francisco or Los Angeles.
And, because of the devaluation of the British Pound,
PAN AMERICAN CUTS FARES. To
travelers from many countries this
means a real savings... as much as..!

Wat Benchamabopit (The Marble Temple),
built of choicest Carrara marble by King Chula-
longkorn (1868-1910), is one of the most beauti-
ful of the many temples in Bangkok, Siam.
Bangkok is a favorite stop for passengers on the
Flying Clippers of Pan American World Airways.
